detail_desc: Shirt in soft, washed denim with a collar, press-studs down the front and yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, long sleeves with a press-stud at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Sandals in grained imitation leather with narrow straps and elastic at the back and sides. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 6 cm.
Fully lined bikini. Top with a racer back and open section at the hem. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.

Slightly shorter, oversized, double-breasted trenchcoat in woven fabric made from a Tencel™ lyocell and cotton blend with notch lapels. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with an adjustable tab at the cuffs, welt side pockets and a detachable belt at the waist. Unlined.
Sandals with wide, crossover straps at the front and an elastic strap at the back. Imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Straight-cut car coat in woven fabric with a collar, concealed buttons down the front and diagonal welt front pockets. Ventilating holes with eyelets under the arms and long sleeves with an adjustable tab at the cuffs. One inner pocket with a press-stud, and a single back vent. Lined.
Shirt in a viscose weave with a narrow, turn-down collar, classic front and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. A hem that is rounded at the front and straight-cut at the back.
Jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with a frilled collar and long raglan sleeves with frilled cuffs.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, and narrow hems. Soft jersey lining for extra warmth.
Shorts in crushed velvet with an elasticated waist, side pockets and short legs with slits in the sides.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist and lined gusset.
Fancy dress wig made from coloured synthetic hair. Mesh lining with an elasticated edge.
Fitted jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool, with a turtle neck and long sleeves with short slits at the cuffs.
Shorts in a softly draping viscose weave. High waist with pleats at the front and wide, covered elastication at the back, and diagonal side pockets.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with worn details, a regular waist, button fly, lower crotch and skinny, tapered legs. The jeans are made partly from recycled cotton.
Lace tights with an elasticated waist.
Jumper in a soft fine knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Blouse in an airy crêpe weave with a small stand-up collar, scalloped trim at the top and concealed buttoning.
T-shirt in organic cotton jersey with a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
T-shirt in sturdy cotton jersey with contrasting colour panels over the shoulders.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a small stand-up collar, V-neck and long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Shirt in airy pima cotton poplin with a collar, buttons down the front and chest pocket. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs and an asymmetric hem at the front.
Joggers in printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Slim-fit, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets. Wide jersey panel at the waist for best fit.
Padded gilet with a detachable, lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, and welt side pockets. Lined.
Socks in a soft fine-knit with elasticated tops.
Top in waffled jersey with long sleeves and ribbed cuffs.
Metal hoop earrings with a textured finish. Diameter approx. 4 cm.
Wide trousers in woven fabric with pleats at the top, side pockets and a concealed zip and ties at one side.
Large, elasticated imitation leather scrunchie.
Socks in a soft knit.
Poncho in a soft, fine-knit wool and cashmere blend with a draped collar and ribbed trim at one side.
Fully lined, patterned bikini top with a wide flounce at the front, ties at the back of the neck and a plastic fastener at the back.
Cap with a motif on the front and adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Baby Exclusive. Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with frills at the top and press-studs on the shoulders.
Blouse in a printed weave with a small stand-up collar, V-neck, short sleeves with a decorative tab and button, and a rounded hem.
Shorts in velour with an adjustable, elasticated waist, a decorative bow at the front, zip at the back and front pockets. Lined.

Shirt jacket in cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. One open chest pocket, two open front pockets, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Leggings in washed, stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake fly and back pockets.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high waist with pleats at the front of the waistband, a zip fly and hook-and-eye fasteners. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight, wide legs.
Tights in a soft, fine knit with an elasticated waist.

Shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and a fake back pocket. Contrasting colour stripes down the sides and decorative seams on the legs. Soft brushed inside.
Trousers in soft viscose jersey with an all-over print and regular, elasticated waist. Side pockets, low crotch and tapered legs.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. Top with raglan sleeves, buttons at one side and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Trousers with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems. The cotton content of the set is organic.
Top in cotton seersucker. Narrow cut at the top with a small opening and button at the back of the neck relaxing into an A-line style with a wide, flounced peplum.
Trainers in canvas with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and patterned soles. Platform 3 cm.

Short, wide dress in airy, crinkled chiffon with a small frilled collar and an opening with ties at the top. Long raglan balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a gathered seam at the waist and a skirt with seams. Lined.

Jacket knitted in soft, thermal fleece with a hood, zip down the front with a chin guard and diagonal side pockets. Jersey trims around the hood, pockets, cuffs and hem. The jacket is made partly from recycled polyester.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif, and narrow ribbing around the neckline.

Short-sleeved boiler suit in airy twill made from a viscose blend with a narrow turn-down collar and concealed buttons down the front. Open chest pockets, diagonal side pockets and an open back pocket. Internal drawstring at the waist, a zip fly, slightly lower crotch and tapered legs.
Sports top in fast-drying, printed functional fabric with short raglan sleeves and visible flatlock seams.
Longer, wide-fitting jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with long sleeves and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in supersoft jersey with a brushed finish. Long, wide puff sleeves and trims around the neckline and cuffs.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton jersey with a chest pocket and a press-stud on one shoulder (sizes 1-4Y without a press-stud).
Wrapover calf-length skirt in a crêpe weave with a tie at the waist and a flounce. Unlined.
Short shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and rounded hems.
Jumper in fine-knit cotton with a ribbed stand-up collar, buttons at the top and ribbing around the cuffs and hem.
Classic T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a text print on the front and round neckline with a narrow trim.
Straight-cut shirt in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Flounced skirt in soft, patterned cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Short cold shoulder dress in a crêpe weave with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and 3/4-length sleeves. Smocking at the waist and flounces at the cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless dress in soft flannel containing glittery threads with gathers and a decorative bow at the top, concealed zip at the back and pockets in the side seams. Lined.
Tunic in an airy weave with an opening with narrow ties at the top, dropped shoulders and wide sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Gathered seam at the hips and a flare to the hem.
Leggings in soft velour with a glittery pattern. Elasticated waist.
Wide top in sweatshirt fabric with a woven lower section, low dropped shoulders and ribbed cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and cutaway coverage at the back.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front. The cotton content of the boxer shorts is organic.
Skirt in a viscose weave with a smocked waist and tiers with overlocked edges. Unlined.
Vest top in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and armholes.
Turban in a soft knit containing some wool.
Cap with an appliqué on the front and concealed elastication at the back.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Gently tailored, collarless jacket woven in a linen blend with welt front pockets and 3/4-length, gathered sleeves. No buttons. Lined.
Short dress in a patterned crêpe weave with buttons down the front, a seam at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves. Unlined.
V-neck jersey nursing top with a wrapover front, concealed press-stud at the top and long sleeves. Practical inner top for ease of nursing access.
Short, sleeveless, A-line dress in cotton poplin with a round neckline, buttons down the back and a frill-trimmed, gathered seam at the hem. Unlined.
Short-sleeved jersey nightdress with a print motif on the front.

Soft, non-wired bra in lace with mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a wide lace trim at the hem.
